languages.text:
The wearer of this cape is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
Also, whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, burning is removed from all adjacent allies.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer of this cape is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
Also, whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, burning is removed from all adjacent allies.

Also, whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, burning is removed from all adjacent allies.

languages.text:
装备者免疫{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态。
此外，当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，所有邻近盟友解除燃烧状态。
languages.original_text:
The wearer of this cape is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
Also, whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, burning is removed from all adjacent allies.

traits.locale_text:
装备者免疫{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态。
此外，当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，所有邻近盟友解除燃烧状态。

languages.text:
Персонаж получает иммунитет к горению.
Кроме того, когда персонаж завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, с его союзников на соседних клетках снимается эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The wearer of this cape is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
Also, whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, burning is removed from all adjacent allies.

traits.locale_text:
Персонаж получает иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горению{/g}.
Кроме того, когда персонаж завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, с его союзников на соседних клетках снимается эффект горения.

Персонаж получает иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горению{/g}.
Кроме того, когда персонаж завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, с его союзников на соседних клетках снимается эффект горения.

languages.text:
このケープの使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}に耐性を得る。
さらに、使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終えるたび、隣接するすべての味方から炎上が取り除かれる。
languages.original_text:
The wearer of this cape is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
Also, whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, burning is removed from all adjacent allies.

traits.locale_text:
このケープの使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}に耐性を得る。
さらに、使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終えるたび、隣接するすべての味方から炎上が取り除かれる。

languages.text:
El portador de esta capa es inmune contra el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}.
Además, cada vez que el portador termine su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, los aliados adyacentes se liberan del efecto de quemadura.
languages.original_text:
The wearer of this cape is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
Also, whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, burning is removed from all adjacent allies.

traits.locale_text:
El portador de esta capa es inmune contra el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}.
Además, cada vez que el portador termine su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, los aliados adyacentes se liberan del efecto de quemadura.

languages.text:
Der Träger dieses Umhangs ist immun gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}.
Außerdem wird bei allen angrenzenden Verbündeten Verbrennen entfernt, wenn der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beendet.
languages.original_text:
The wearer of this cape is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
Also, whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, burning is removed from all adjacent allies.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger dieses Umhangs ist immun gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}.
Außerdem wird bei allen angrenzenden Verbündeten Verbrennen entfernt, immer wenn der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beendet.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur de cette cape est invulnérable à l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}.
Et au terme du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur, tous les alliés adjacents sont libérés de l'effet Combustion.
